plot: In one of Browning poems with which all the world is content. Even those who fancy the great poet to be as intelligible read backward as forward, are constrained to make exception in favor ...
title: Pied Piper of Hamelin
plot_es: In one of Browning poems with which all the world is content. Even those who fancy the great poet to be as intelligible read backward as forward, are constrained to make exception in favor ...
